kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=ifelse, url=http://127.0.0.1:5000/books, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: GET On Session
kw.doc: Sends a GET request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: GET Request : url=http://127.0.0.1:5000/books path_url=/books headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.31.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive'} body=None

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.arg: The URL contains the expected text.
The URL does not contain the expected text.
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Log
kw.arg: The URL does not contain the expected text.
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
kw.msg: The URL does not contain the expected text.
